message: Using craigslist and padmapper. Anything else I should try? Looking for a cat friendly studio near SoMa.
I think that's your best bet. Also tell your friends you're looking!
been thinking of getting a new apartment but it's really hard to find nicer stuff on craigslist and padmapper
I love padmapper, it's got to be the best apartment hunting tool out there
@leah rent.com is surprisingly good for higher end stuff, at least it seems to be I've never actually gotten an apartment on it

Padmapper is great, but due to craigslist not sharing addresses in the rss feed, you can't always rely on it showing you every place on craigslist (it has to scrape the page, so it's not 100% reliable).
I've had a lot of luck just walking around the area I want to live and looking for the For Rent signs and calling them. It's still the most effective way!
